how to play: Your usual money-making combo is First Strike + E, followed by Q + R with auto attacks if possible.
Your alternate combo just for poke is First Strike + Q + W + auto attacks if possible.
This is the burn version of AP Graves.
Playstyle is to spam Smoke Screen (W) and Collateral Damage (R) off cooldown and apply the burn effects from Liandry's Torment.
Imperial Mandate will proc from your Smoke Screen (W) even after it dealt initial damage.
You can also spam End of the Line (Q), but for this you probably need some mana items (Muramana).
You get extra spikey by using Quickdraw (E), thanks to increased Armor (it gives double stacks if you E into enemy direction). So do it!
